title: Literary Argument - continuing influence of home

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze the continuing influence of “home” on the character and how that contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze the continuing influence of “home” on the character and how that contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
